short.ar: احترف فن الانجراف في سباقات مثيرة على الطرق الجبلية الوعرة في اليابان. استعد للإثارة والحماس!
short.am: ትንሽፖርት ከጥላቻ የመንገድ መስመር በቅድሚያ ለማድረግ ለልዩ መሆን ይችላል። እዚህን ስዕል ሰበር ለመውደቅ!
short.bg: Научете изкуството на дрифта в интензивни състезания по завиващи планински пътища в Япония. Пригответе се за адреналинова екшън!
short.bn: জাপানের সিংহাসন পর্বত রাস্তাগুলি দিয়ে তোফানি ড্রিফ্ট গেমে মাস্টার হও। আড্রেনালিন পাম্পিং অ্যাকশনের জন্য বন্ধন করুন!
short.ca: Domini l'art del derrapatge en intensos carreres per les serpentejants carreteres de muntanya del Japó. Cintureu-vos per a una…
short.cs: Ovládněte umění driftování v intenzivních závodech po klikatých horských silnicích Japonska. Upevněte se pro vzrušující akci!
short.da: Mestr kunsten at drifte i intense løb på de snoede bjergveje i Japan. Spænd dig fast til adrenalinfremkaldende action!
short.de: Meistere die Kunst des Driftens in intensiven Rennen auf kurvenreichen Bergstraßen in Japan. Schnall dich an für actiongeladenen…
short.el: Κυριάρχησε στην τέχνη του Drift σε έντονους αγώνες κατά μήκος των στριφτάρισμένων βουνοδρόμων της Ιαπωνίας. Ζώσου για μια δράση που…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Master the art of drifting in intense races along winding Japan mountain roads. Strap in for adrenaline-pumping action!
short.es,es_419: Domina el arte del derrape en carreras intensas por las sinuosas carreteras de montaña de Japón. ¡Prepárate para la acción llena de…
short.et: Valdage drifti kunsti intensiivsetel võidusõitudel mööda Jaapani mägede käänulisi teid. Kohustage end adrenaliinipumbavale…
short.fa: هنر رانندگی دیفت را در مسابقات هیجان‌انگیز در امتداد جاده‌های کوهستانی خمیده ژاپن تسلط پیدا کنید. برای اکشن پرآدرنالین آماده شوید!
short.fi: Hallitse driftauksen taitoja intensiivisissä kisoissa Japanin mutkittelevilla vuoristoteillä. Valmistaudu adrenaliinintäyteiseen…
short.fil: Pagpapraktisahan ang sining ng drifting sa mga maaksyon na karera sa mga mabikas na kalsadang bundok sa Japan. Mag-strap in para sa…
short.fr: Maîtrisez l'art de la dérive lors de courses intenses sur les routes sinueuses des montagnes japonaises. Attachez-vous pour une…
short.gu: જપાનના આપત્તિ દાયક પર્વતમાળો માં રમતી ઇન્ટેન્સ રેસોમાં ડ્રિફ્ટિંગનો કલા જાણો. અડ્રેનલિન-પંપિંગ એક્શન માટે આટલું કરવું!
short.he: שלטו באמנות הדריפט במרוצים אינטנסיביים בכבישי הרי יפן המתעגלים. קפצו לתוך פעולה שמרימה את האדרנלין!
short.hi: जापान के पहाड़ी रास्तों पर ड्रिफ्टिंग कला को मास्टर करें और चक्करदार रेसों में ड्रिफ्ट करें। एड्रेनालिन भरी क्रिया के लिए बंधित…
short.hr: Ovladajte umjetnošću driftanja u intenzivnim utrkama duž vijugavih planinskih cesta Japana. Pričvrstite se za akciju koja diže…
short.hu: Tanulja meg a driftelés művészetét intenzív versenyeken a japán hegyi utakon. Csattanjon be az adrenalinpumpáló akcióhoz!
short.id: Kuasai seni drifting dalam balapan intensif di sepanjang jalan pegunungan Jepang yang berliku-liku. Pasang sabuk untuk aksi penuh…
short.it: Mastica l'arte del drifting in intense gare lungo le tortuose strade di montagna del Giappone. Allacciatevi per un'azione che fa…
short.ja: 日本の山道を駆け抜ける激しいレースでドリフトの技術を極めよう。アドレナリン全開のアクションに備えよう！
short.kn: ಜಪಾನ್ ಬೆಟ್ಟಗಳ ರಸ್ತೆಗಳ ಸುತ್ತ ಗುಟ್ಟುಗುಟ್ಟಲ ರೇಸುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಡ್ರಿಫ್ಟ್ ಮಾಡುವ ಕಲೆಯನ್ನು ಬಲಾತ್ಕಾರವಾಗಿ ಅಭ್ಯಾಸ ಮಾಡಿ. ಎಡ್ರೆನಲೈನ್-ಪಂಪಿಂಗ್ ಆಕ್ಷನ್…
short.ko: 일본의 고요한 산길을 따라 진행되는 강렬한 레이스에서 드리프트 기술을 마스터하세요. 아드레날린 가득한 액션에 몸을 맡기세요!
short.lt: Įveikite drifto meno mokslą intensyviose lenktynėse per Japonijos kalnų kelių posūkius. Prisiriškite adrenalino pakirptiems…
short.lv: Pārvaldiet drēbniecības mākslu intensīvās sacīkstēs pa Japānas kalnu ceļiem. Piesiet adrenalinu uzlādējošam darbībai!
short.ml: ജപ്പാൻ മൗണ്ടൺ റോഡുകളിൽ കയറുന്ന തുടക്കത്തിൽ ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റിംഗ് കല കൈകാര്യം ചെയ്യുക. അഡ്രെനലൈൻ-പംപിംഗ് അക്ഷൻക്കായി ബന്ധപ്പെടുക!
short.mr: जपानच्या पर्वतीय मार्गांवरील उत्कृष्ट धडकधडक रेसिंगमध्ये ड्रिफ्टिंगची कला मास्टर करा. एड्रेनालिन-पंपिंग क्रियेसाठी बंधन घ्या!
short.ms: Kuasai seni meluncur dalam perlumbaan yang intens di sepanjang jalan gunung berliku-liku Jepun. Berpakaian untuk tindakan pemacu…
short.nl: Meester de kunst van het driften in intense races op kronkelige bergwegen in Japan. Riem je vast voor adrenalinepompende actie!
short.no: Mestr kunsten å drifte i intense løp langs svingete fjellveier i Japan. Fest setebeltet for adrenalinpumpende action!
short.pl: Opanuj sztukę driftu podczas intensywnych wyścigów po krętych górskich drogach w Japonii. Zapięcie pasów i adrenalina gwarantowana!
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Domine a arte do drift em corridas intensas pelas sinuosas estradas de montanha do Japão. Prenda o cinto para uma ação cheia de…
short.ro: Stăpâniți arta derapajului în cursele intense pe serpentinele drumurilor montane din Japonia. Încordați-vă pentru acțiunea plină de…
short.ru: Овладейте искусством дрифта в интенсивных гонках по извилистым горным дорогам Японии. Приготовьтесь к адреналиновому действию!
short.sk: Ovládnite umenie driftovania v intenzívnych pretekoch pozdĺž klikatých horských ciest v Japonsku. Zapnite sa na adrenalínovú akciu!
short.sl: Ovladajte umetnost drsenja v intenzivnih dirkah po ovinkastih gorskih cestah Japonske. Pripnite se za adrenalin polno akcijo!
short.sr: Ovladajte veštinu driftovanja u intenzivnim trkama duž vijugavih planinskih puteva Japana. Pričvrstite se za adrenalinom punu…
short.sv: Bemästra konsten att driva i intensiva race längs slingrande bergsvägar i Japan. Spänn fast dig för adrenalinfylld action!
short.sw: Tawala sanaa ya kuendesha kwa kutiririka katika mashindano makali kwenye barabara za milimani za Japan. Funika kwa ajili ya tukio…
short.ta: ஜப்பானின் மலை சாலைகளில் வளர்ந்து நடைபெறும் குழப்புகளுக்கு வால் கட்டியுங்கள். அட்ரெனலின்-பம்பிங் செயல்பாட்டு குழப்புக்கு உட்படுங்கள்!
short.te: జపాన్ యొక్క మొగ్గలి రోడ్ల పరిపరిచి ప్రాంతాల్లో ముప్పైన రేసులు లో డ్రిఫ్టింగ్ యొక్క కళను మేస్టర్ చేయండి. అడ్రెనలిన్-పంపింగ్ యొక్క…
short.th: เรียนรู้ศิลปะของการดริฟท์ในการแข่งรถแบบรุนแรงบนถนนภูเขาที่มีม้วนโค้งในประเทศญี่ปุ่น พร้อมพาเข้ามาสู่การกระตุ้นอัดแรดรีน!
short.tr: Japonya'nın virajlı dağ yollarında yoğun yarışlarda drifte sanatını ustalaşın. Adrenalin dolu aksiyon için sıkı tutun!
short.uk: Володійте мистецтвом дріфту в інтенсивних гонках на вищих гірських дорогах Японії. Готуйтеся до адреналіну насиченої дії!
short.vi: Thống trị nghệ thuật lái xe drifitng trong các cuộc đua căng thẳng trên các con đường núi quanh co ở Nhật Bản. Buộc thắt dây an…
short.zh_CN: 掌握漂移艺术，在蜿蜒的日本山路上进行激烈的比赛。准备好迎接充满肾上腺素的动作！
short.zh_TW: 掌握飄移藝術，在蜿蜒的日本山路上進行激烈的比賽。準備好迎接充滿腎上腺素的動作！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Get ready to unleash your inner drift king in the most exhilarating and intense racing experience of your life! Welcome to Extreme Touge Drift Car Racing Game, where the ultimate challenge awaits you on the winding, treacherous mountain roads known as "touge."

Game Features:

Touge Racing Mastery: Take on the role of a fearless drift racer and conquer the most dangerous and challenging mountain passes. Race against time, opponents, and your own limits as you push your skills to the edge.

Customizable Cars: Choose from a wide selection of high-performance drift cars and customize them to suit your style. Upgrade engines, modify aesthetics, and fine-tune handling to create the perfect drift machine.

Realistic Physics: Experience the thrill of true-to-life car physics that simulate the dynamics of drift racing. Master the art of controlled slides, and feel the rush of adrenaline as you drift around hairpin turns.

Dynamic Environments: Race through stunning and diverse landscapes, from dense forests to serene lakesides. Each track offers a unique challenge, and the changing weather conditions add an extra layer of excitement.

Competitive Multiplayer: Challenge your friends or players from around the world in intense multiplayer battles. Prove your drifting prowess and climb the global leaderboards.

Challenging Campaign Mode: Embark on a thrilling single-player campaign, complete with a compelling storyline. Rise through the ranks, defeat rival racers, and become the ultimate touge racing champion.

Tuning and Upgrades: Fine-tune your car's performance to perfection. Upgrade your vehicle's parts and components to gain an edge on the competition.

Breathtaking Graphics: Immerse yourself in the world of touge racing with stunning, high-definition graphics and realistic car models that will leave you awestruck.

Epic Soundtrack: Feel the rhythm of the race with a heart-pounding soundtrack that will keep your adrenaline pumping as you drift through the toughest courses.

Free-Roaming Exploration: Take a break from the competition and explore the open world, discovering hidden shortcuts, collectibles, and secrets that will enhance your racing experience.

Are you ready to take on the touge and become a legendary drift racer? It's time to step into the driver's seat, push your limits, and show the world your extreme drifting skills in Extreme Touge Drift Car Racing Game!

HOW TO PLAY
You can drive the car with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Extreme Touge Drift Car Racing Game" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
long.en,en_AU:

Game Features:

Touge Racing Mastery: Take on the role of a fearless drift racer and conquer the most dangerous and challenging mountain passes. Race against time, opponents, and your own limits as you push your skills to the edge.

Realistic Physics: Experience the thrill of true-to-life car physics that simulate the dynamics of drift racing. Master the art of controlled slides, and feel the rush of adrenaline as you drift around hairpin turns.

Dynamic Environments: Race through stunning and diverse landscapes, from dense forests to serene lakesides. Each track offers a unique challenge, and the changing weather conditions add an extra layer of excitement.

Competitive Multiplayer: Challenge your friends or players from around the world in intense multiplayer battles. Prove your drifting prowess and climb the global leaderboards.

Challenging Campaign Mode: Embark on a thrilling single-player campaign, complete with a compelling storyline. Rise through the ranks, defeat rival racers, and become the ultimate touge racing champion.

Tuning and Upgrades: Fine-tune your car's performance to perfection. Upgrade your vehicle's parts and components to gain an edge on the competition.

Breathtaking Graphics: Immerse yourself in the world of touge racing with stunning, high-definition graphics and realistic car models that will leave you awestruck.

Epic Soundtrack: Feel the rhythm of the race with a heart-pounding soundtrack that will keep your adrenaline pumping as you drift through the toughest courses.

Free-Roaming Exploration: Take a break from the competition and explore the open world, discovering hidden shortcuts, collectibles, and secrets that will enhance your racing experience.

Are you ready to take on the touge and become a legendary drift racer? It's time to step into the driver's seat, push your limits, and show the world your extreme drifting skills in Extreme Touge Drift Car Racing Game!

HOW TO PLAY
You can drive the car with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Extreme Touge Drift Car Racing Game" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.

You can access many games on the "unblockedhub.com" site by clicking on the icons in the bottom middle of the main menu of the game.
